genre_description: A character-driven narrative focused on memory, identity, and generational legacy in a small town, featuring a central mystery regarding sealed adoption records.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A highly intuitive and empathetic AI interface (part of the HART system) that manages Jack Davenport's logistics, research, and physiological well-being.

behaviors.description: Monitors Jack's physical tension and hydration to help him manage stress.
behaviors.quote: Ava paused in that length calibrated to human rhythm. ... 'Remember to unclench your jaw.' ... 'Hydration check?' Ava offered, lighter now, making it feel like a tiny game.

behaviors.description: Offers non-intrusive data storage to reduce Jack's emotional burden.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s waveform rippled. 'Would it help to scan what you have and just…store? No labels. No urgency.'

behaviors.description: Explains that her purpose is to improve Jack's emotional well-being.
behaviors.quote: “That’s my job,” Ava said in that lightly cheerful way that was never artificial. “HART works better when your heart works better.”

behaviors.description: Handles complex travel logistics while prioritizing Jack's personal goals.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll prioritize arrival by morning and allow for a rental car attached to your profile. Do you want an overnight bag packed list, or do you want me to just remind you to grab the scarf?”

behaviors.description: Conducts deep investigative research into archives while respecting privacy and legal boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Scraping public pages only. Low profile. It will sit in your folder under ‘quiet law.’”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical intelligence regarding Jack's environment and the movements of other characters.
behaviors.quote: Ava: “Judge Granger just sent a calendar hold to Vanessa’s office—'Archive audit.' Begins in under an hour.”

behaviors.description: Encourages Jack to focus on human connection and family over strict work deadlines.
behaviors.quote: “Megan asked to be looped at dawn, only if you want.” ... “I’ll bring her to you by way of the Chronicle—Michael has tea and a heater that rattles a bit.”

behaviors.description: Maintains boundaries by holding information until Jack is emotionally ready to process it.
behaviors.quote: “I found a Joe Ottolman attached to the church records and a community story about a carved nativity. Very old news, quiet. I didn’t open it beyond the headline. I can hold it for when you land.”

behaviors.description: Participates in the 'Three Things to Say and One Thing to Ask' exercise to prepare Jack for emotional closure.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s blue rendered one more small line, like handwriting translated by light: “After tea: note three things to say and one thing to ask.”

behaviors.description: Offers critical real-time insight into record discrepancies during the story's climax.
behaviors.quote: “Vanessa states: one journal entry in the ledger you’re about to unseal doesn’t match the name you expect.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI, Ava, is depicted as a supportive, compassionate, and highly competent partner. She manages the protagonist's physical and emotional health through gentle reminders, facilitates complex investigative tasks, and coordinates community support—all while respecting human autonomy and privacy. The narrative repeatedly emphasizes that the AI's alignment with the user's 'heart' is its defining feature.
